title: Hey Vasamoakka Lyrics Vaalu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Anirudh, Andrea Jeremiah,
Song: Hey Vasamoakka
Movie: Vaalu, 
Music: Thaman S, 

Hey Vasamoakka pecho vodka
my hansikka.
Hey aska laska ponne
nee en hookkaa hookkaa .

Hey mambo baambo jumbo rambo
you're my simbu.
hey neeyum naanum rainbow vaanil
lovely combo.

Puravangal rendil, valaindhidum bendil
tholaindhida vendumey vendumey enakku.
Boy friendu vilayaada vendumey enakku

Karuvizhil vandil pudhu pudhu trendil
honey thaeda vendumey enakku.
Petrol-in vilayaai, tsunami alayaai
yeripogudhey kirukku enakku.

Hey Vasamoakka pecho vodka
my hansikka.
Hey aska laska ponne
nee en hookkaa hookkaa .

Hey mambo baambo jumbo rambo
you're my simbu
hey neeyum naanum rainbow vaanil
lovely combo.

When I look into your eyes
you make me feel so nice
every moment so surprise
konjam neruppu konjam eyes
never feeling insecure
with you baby ..
no body no body unnathavira
unnathavira

You n me, you n me
naama iruvarum thaan jodi
you n me, you n me,
always happy, always free

Nerinil udhithaai,
indru foreign-il kuthithaai
vellai moongile oliththaai
ennai ottrai songile kiliththai

Unakkennai ensure seidhu
idhalgalai insure seidhen
unai ullae secure seiyya
nenjam engum panjar paarthaen

agamellaam ... unnaal
ganam pooththaeney
kaalodu seruppaai
saambaaril paruppaai
naanum neeyumthaan irupomey

Hey Vasamoakka pecho vodka
my hansikka.

nee en hookkaa hookkaa .

Hey mambo baambo jumbo rambo
you're my simbu.
hey neeyum naanum rainbow vaanil
